name: Feed Me (aenever)
description:
Feed Me is a 'Silly Sausage' remake - made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5 getting the mechanics just right took a very long time, yet the results were better than expected.

The goal is to feed your plant all the flys on the screen, and escape by landing on the exit platform. It's a one screen arcade puzzle game that looks simple, yet it'll have you coming back for more until you perfect each level.
